name: California Roll Salad
author: TARA LYON
summary: A delicious, light, spicy salad, excellent for summer cooking! A perfect side to any grilled Asian-style dishes. Wasabi paste may be used instead of the powder if it is more convenient. If you discover you have made the dressing too spicy, adjust by adding more mayonnaise.
ingredients: 1  English cucumber, cut into 1 inch strips
2 teaspoons wasabi powder, or to taste
directions: Place rice and water in a small saucepan, and bring to a boil
Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until rice is tender
In a large serving bowl, toss together the lettuce, cucumber, avocado and imitation crabmeat
In a small bowl, stir together the wasabi powder, mayonnaise, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar and sesame oil
Toss salad with dressing (recommended), or serve with dressing on the side
